ygData.subject: Re: Lens Quest from Akanon in Library
ygData.msgSnippet: Nope, he s on the right track. The second quest you are talking about is not given by a person inside the observatories. It s given by someone not on the list
ygData.messageBody:
Nope, he's on the right track. The second quest you are talking about is not
given by a person inside the observatories. It's given by someone not on
the list for the spare lens quest.

-Zikkin

Vince Montana wrote:

> From: "Vince Montana" <montana@...>
>
> you may have the quest mixed up, there are 2 separate quests, involving the
> lenses, 1 in which you will get the observers staff, don't be confused on
> the quests and make sure you are following the right one,
>
> Danek HealFast
> Leader of the Black Moon
> 41 druid
> Mithaniel Marr
